thread.title: FMC GlobalSat Taps Peder Hansen To Aid Renewable Energy Sales Effort

author: cnbc.com
title: FMC GlobalSat Taps Peder Hansen To Aid Renewable Energy Sales Effort
text:
FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla., Feb. 13, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- FMC GlobalSat Holdings Inc., a satellite communications and wireless services provider, has named Peder Hansen as renewable energy accounts manager. Hansen, a wind industry veteran, is charged with building FMC GlobalSat's brand and reach in renewable energy, such as the wind and solar markets.
"Peder Hansen is a skilled leader in the renewable energy field. His wealth of experience and contacts make him an invaluable addition to the FMC GlobalSat team," explains Chris MacDonald, chief operating officer at FMC GlobalSat. "As FMC GlobalSat endeavors to be a major provider of global satellite communications and services, we will utilize Peder's vast supply chain and development experience to propel our growth."
During his more than 25-year career, Hansen has worked in all facets of the wind industry. Before joining FMC GlobalSat, Hansen was Senior Sales Engineer and Blade Production Planning and Inventory Control at GE Wind Energy. Before GE, Hansen was Executive Vice President at NorthStar Wind Towers and Global Sales Manager of Wind Energy for Valmont, where he was responsible for bringing wind tower designs to the market.
About FMC GlobalSat
FMC GlobalSat, a leading provider of global connectivity, provides best-in-class satellite and wireless solutions to markets and industries that requires long term visibility into cost, and demand strict adherence to regulatory requirements.
FMC GlobalSat provides satellite communications solutions to the renewable energy industry including Kymeta communication solutions. The company configures, integrates and deploys Kymeta solutions to support the renewable energy market with reliable, high-throughput satellites leveraging 53 satellites, 8 teleports, 20,000 miles of fiber optic, 24/7 enterprise grade technical support with 56 points of presence in 37 cities around the world.
FMC GlobalSat also offers 3G, and 4G cellular solutions across CDMA, GSM, and LTE networks in more than 190 countries, and more than 550 underlying carriers, all delivered on a single platform. FMC GlobalSat and its carrier partners' networks provide 99.995% reliability, unmatched in the IoT/M2M communications industry.
